name: NSPressGestureRecognizer
desc: A discrete gesture recognizer that tracks whether the user holds down a mouse button for a minimum amount of time before releasing it.

items.name: var allowableMovement: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum movement of the mouse in the view before the gesture fails.

items.name: var buttonMask: Int
items.desc: A bit mask of the buttons required to recognize this press.

items.name: var minimumPressDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The minimum time (in seconds) that the user must hold the mouse button in the view for a valid gesture.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of necessary touches on a Touch Bar for the gesture recognizer to match.
